metadata.title: CVE-2024-27044 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix potential NULL pointer dereferences in'dcn10_set_output_transfer_func()'The 'stream' pointer is used in dcn10_set_output_transfer_func() beforethe check if 'stream' is NULL.Fixes the below:drivers/gpu/drm/amd/amdgpu/../display/dc/hwss/dcn10/dcn10_hwseq.c:1892dcn10_set_output_transfer_func() warn: variable dereferenced before check'stream' (see line 1875)

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
